items.title: Debt Free Living Philosophy
items.headline: Tactics and Methods to Help You Get Out of Debt and Build a Better Life
objectives_summary: Alternative ways to handle money, credit and debt. Normal is deep in debt up to your eyeballs and beyond, struggling to survive paycheck to paycheck for millions of people - and normal is a terrible way to live!

It's all about choices and results.  If you don't like what you have now, and what you have been getting then change it! In this course we will discuss options and tactics you can use to improve your life dramatically and immediately.
We will look at how debt damages life and destroys independence and how to adopt a new philosophy - a debt free living philosophy of  your  own.
